pesticide.PPE: Long-sleeved shirt and long pants; chemical resistant gloves made of any waterproof material such as polyethylene or polyvinylchloride; shoes plus socks.

Safety_Information.general_Info: Harmful if swallowed, inhaled, or absorbed through skin. Causes moderate eye irritation. Avoid breathing dust, vapor or spray mist. Avoid contact with skin, eye or clothing.
Safety_Information.if_In_Eyes: Hold eye open and rinse slowly and gently with water for 15-20 minutes. Remove contact lenses, if present, after the first 5 minutes, then continue rinsing. Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.if_Swallowed: Call poison control center or doctor immediately for treatment advice. Have person sip a glass of water if able to swallow. Do not induce vomiting unless told to do so by a poison control center or doctor.
Safety_Information.if_On_Skin: Take off contaminated clothing. Rinse skin immediately with plenty of water for 15-20 minutes. Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.if_Inhaled: Move person to fresh air. If person is not breathing, call 911 or an ambulance, then give artificial respiration, preferably by mouth-to-mouth, if possible. Call a poison control center or doctor for further treatment advice.
Safety_Information.physician_Note: Have the product container or label with you when calling a poison control center or doctor. For medical emergencies involving this product, call toll free 1-800-441-3637.

Application_Info.max_applications_per_season: Split Application: Two applications totaling the fully labeled CANOPY rate may be made per soybean cropping cycle.
